document_data.name: Shakujo Yari
document_data.mainbody: A '''Shakujo yari''' was a weapon unique to the continent of [[Kara-Tur]]
document_data.Description: A shakujo yari was a spear ingeniously disguised within a sheath to give the appearance of a regular [[staff]]. When the sheath was intact, it could be utilized as a [[bo stick]]. Typically carried during covert missions or when the wielder wished to appear defenseless.
